website_summaries.verdict: This high-end and economical adjustable weight bench enables you to enjoy a full-body workout.
pros: Equipped with a powder-coated steel frame, high-density foam and deluxe upholstery for optimal quality
Includes a convenient 6-position back pad that you can adjust in seconds
Features built-in transport wheels and a handle grip so you can quickly and effortlessly move the bench as needed

website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality, extremely versatile weight bench that allows you to train everything from your shoulders to your abs.
pros: With 6 different back pad positions and 3 different seat angles, you can perform a wide variety of free-weight exercises
It's possible to attach the bench to other equipment for even more workout options
The built-in handle and transport wheel help facilitate mobility
cons: If you have limited experience following assembly instructions, allow yourself some extra time to build this bench

customer_reviews.title: Decided to buy since it got mostly good reviews, but it broke on first flat bench ...
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy since it got mostly good reviews, but it broke on first flat bench press attempt. Broke even before I unracked the weight. As soon as I went to push the bar off the rack the back support snapped and my head went backwards. Maybe I got a bad one but I would steer clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product and horrendous customer service The sitting pad has ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product and horrendous customer service The sitting pad has bad screw and threading and I called the company customer service and I was told that they have it back ordered and they will get in touch but they have not.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don't risk injury!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write these but for this I will. Just got my own half cage and weight lifting system. I was warming up benching 135 and I weigh 145 and the weld for the adjustable part of the bench broke around rep number 5. It came in the mail yesterday and was set up just as the instructions requested. Lucky for me I have catch bars and a spotter. Do not trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Paden Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. I'm 6'4" @ 200lbs and it holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Received and installed this yesterday. Very good quality. I'm 6'4" @ 200lbs and it holds me just fine for bench presses and other exercises. Can easily do tri dips using the bench and it doesn't wobble or move at all. Item folds up good and I can store it against the wall behind out of the way. Very pleased with the item. If anything changes over time, will update the review here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Good bench, though one of the welds broke
customer_reviews.text: Good bench, though one of the welds broke. I way 175 and was using 65 pound free weights with the bench in the flat bench position, and the weld they holds the adjustment arm on the backrest broke off. Lucky I didn't drop my freeweight on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Nevin

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on 12 August, and it is already broken! Thank goodness I had a spotter because while doing bench press (mind you, I am only 125 lbs, benching 105lbs) the top of the seat where your shoulders rest, collapsed. Incredibly disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Marcy is Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 other Marcy benches at my last home. Couldn't travel with them so I bought a new one. This one is really sturdy. My last Marcy adjustable bench had a sliding pivot system on the adjust. This one is just lift up the cushion and set it back down. So simple and fast. As always, hardware is great quality and the aesthetic is pleasing. The black and white color scheme really pops out. Sturdy and safe, not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Decided to write a review since despite mostly good reviews, I had read some negative ones. My experience has been extremely positive with this bench so far. Very heavy duty materials and didn’t have any of the fit/assembly problems some here mentioned. I think it’s import to read the instructions and look at the diagrams carefully; I admittedly don’t always do that myself but did here and all turned out well. It’s sturdy, comfortable and easily adjustable. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neustater

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the positive reviews, I decided to take a chance. The product arrived with many pieces scratched/gouged (though the box was undamaged). Since it isn't a showpiece, I decided to overlook it & put it together. I got everything almost finished & the threading of the MAIN AXLE is damaged to where the nut won't attach. I reached out to MARCY directly, they had a new part in the mail within 1 day. In this day and age, good customer service like that is difficult to come by. Amazon, likewise took care of me (as usual) for the inconvenience. Overall, a nice, affordable bench backed by a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Cee C

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but pretty firm...
customer_reviews.text: The bench looks nice, except I'm not a fan at all of the red writing, and it went together fairly easily, but the cushions are really firm. They looks soft and cushy but they're not. I know this is a workout bench, not a couch, but a little softer would have been better. But at the price you can't beat it. I now have the marcy dumbell rack and this bench and I'm impressed with both. The company makes quality equipment at a reasonable cost and it's nice that companies like this actually exist.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: The 0 degree position is actually decline as well the ...
customer_reviews.text: The 0 degree position is actually decline as well the 90 degree. The fabric is on loosely and forms ripples whenever used. The part of the bench that your back rests on is flimsy as it is only supported by a small being running down the middle. If you sit on the edge it will bend and crack. The part where your booty sits on is also angled instead of straight on with the rest of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: tears

customer_reviews.title: Club quality for home at great price
customer_reviews.text: I had considered a bench for home for a while. This bench made me sorry I waited so long. It was a bit of a pain to assemble but the level of effort was in line with the very sturdy, adjustable, versatile bench that resulted. It looks great, has wheels to move around easily, and can flatten and stand on its end to get it out of the way. I'm altogether very pleased and would recommend it without hesitation. It's also a great price, I think, for something commercial quality.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I haven't done any heavy benching on it but ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I haven't done any heavy benching on it but I jumped on it (150lbs) and tested some ab movements on it seems solid enough. This is my second marcy bench I've bought the first was the bench press olympic station that i bought 6 years ago and it still solid so I trusted this brand and am not disappointed. My old bench is the red/black one as you can see still in good condition. The new one is the white/black.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench At An Even Better Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value bench. The assembly took about 30 minutes and was extremely easy. The bench is really easy to adjust and definitely feels well made and safe. I've used it four times a week for almost a month now and it has worked beyond my expectations. I use this primarily with Bowflex SelectTech dumbells. The bench adjusts to all of the different angles I need. I was also considering the Bowflex 3.1 bench and this one gives you a few more angles but costs the same or less than the Bowflex bench.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce2113

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking, good quality bench
customer_reviews.text: I don't really write reviews because who has the time and what for but I guess it's only fair for this bench. The first thing that impressed me was the way the seats looked, very professionally looking not cheap vinyl and as I assembled the bench I got to see up close the quality of all the fixtures and fittings. All the parts were well labelled and the instructions were quite frankly some of the best I have ever seen. The bench looks so good I think my wife might let me keep in in the bedroom and I won't have to do my weight program in the garage ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Panzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described -- only better. Sturdy, durable, simple to assemble. I would also like to note that the customer service at Marcy is absolutely superb. I had a minor issue with the bench, and they really went the extra mile -- in the middle of this national crisis! -- to make things right. I can't say enough for their efficiency and friendliness. I'll surely use them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Do you even bench bro?
customer_reviews.text: It's a workout bench... what else can you say? Fully adjustable like the page says, incline, decline, flat, all positions very stable. Not so compact storage but how often are you going to put it away if you're really using it? Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assemble and adjust, and solid. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this weight bench. Assembly was a breeze, with all parts well-machined. It is remarkably sturdy, particularly for a home bench. Just about the right amount of cushion firmness. And the back is the perfect height - long enough to provide head support, but not too long for incline tricep extensions or dumbbell rows. I also appreciate the lack of a leg apparatus. They just get in the way, and never work that well. You’ve found your bench. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price for a once size fits all bench
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded my expectations. It’s solid, wide enough, has a bunch of adjustments, had a decent fit and finish and looks nice. I actually have no complaints and would highly recommend this if you only want 1 bench to do it all. This isn’t to take the place of dedicated welded gym equipment but it does a great job,
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction!  But, no simple task to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It's a well-built piece of equipment and I've been using weight lifting equipment for 45 years, so I believe that I know the difference. But it does require a significant amount of effort and tools to assemble, remember to follow the directions closely, or you will be disassembling and reassembling portions of it often.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Good bench for taller people
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a bench for awhile in this price range. I am 6 2 and needed on that is long enough. Basically what found is that in this price ranger you can get one that has an adjustable seat or with leg holds. I use the bench for dumbbell workouts. Primarily Bodybeast. I found the legs were not necessary for me and prefer that I can adjust the seat tilt when doing inclined exercises. I have room to spare to support my neck and head. This would still be an effective bench even if I were a few inches taller.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and unstable
customer_reviews.text: Horrible bench. Very disappointing. The back wobbles right and left and it is barely usable. It does not provide proper support for benching,. As you're trying to keep the bar level, the bench is rocking you right and left. It really is too bad because the quality of the materials is very good.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Firm
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were easy to follow and the equipment is very sturdy. The back of my head is supported by the bench which is long enough when seated upright. I have just completed the assembly and it is exactly what I was looking for. I will try to update this review after a couple of years I suppose, however, you can safely assume no news is good news, if you never hear again from me.
customer_reviews.author: I.B

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, shipped quickly, good assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to any home gym. Barbell and dumbbell variations that won't strain your back. Interesting upholstery - looks like the seat out of a sports car or an airplane - not out of place in an office or living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good for its price
customer_reviews.text: Very good value, can adjust to all forms of work outs. Only downside is that the back pad is not mounted to the skeleton in a very secure way, so avoid putting much weight on its edge. But this is not a commercial grade bench to begin with so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Quantitative Z

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a busted broken box.....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a busted broken box, no packing slip, no additional packing other then the box it comes in. Put the bench together and the holes in the seat adjustment do not line up with the pull pin so the seat will not lock into place. Not sure if it was damaged in shipment or just poor manufacturing. Waiting to hear back from Marcy on a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bench for the price. Very sturdy and versatile. The only minor challenge was putting the bench together. The instructions were a little difficult to follow as the illustrations can be hard to follow, but once completed, the bench is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. My 13 year old son did it. Super stable. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Motts

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19-GAINZ
customer_reviews.text: Glad I scored this before the damn pandemic shut all the gyms down. Sturdy enough for the price point ($113). Slides around a bit but no big deal. Just thankful I have SOMEthing to workout on. To the review “Poorly Prepared”, your seat is on backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I think these bench is good enough for a home gym and honestly, you get what you paid for. This bench isn't super stable or heavy duty, which is fine when it's just being shared between two people.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: I am new to lifting and this is my first bench. Took less than 2 hours to assemble. 58lbs bull terrier for reference. Easy to change inclines. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: E reader

customer_reviews.title: Well made but only time will tell
customer_reviews.text: The metal work is great - the padding is thick - I am a little worried that the way the wood backing to the bench attaches will not last but so far so good - very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MARK O

customer_reviews.title: Get you one
customer_reviews.text: The bench took a little while to assemble, but it was worth it. I’m under 200lbs and it’s very sturdy for me. It’s been used for incline bench, behind the neck press, and close grip bench. What else do you need
customer_reviews.author: Matt A from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Let down by poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: This bench would be amazing for the price. It is very sturdy and when fully operational, has a great range of movement. However... Because of one poor weld at a rather crucial place (the bracket for where the adjustable post joins the backrest) the bench is unable to be securely placed into the upright seated position. Very disappointing since the main draw of the bench is the fact it can be inclined and declined. Will be contacting Amazon for a replacement part and will consider re-reviewing after.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control.  Mine is not useable.
customer_reviews.text: The bench I received is made slightly off not allowing the pin to go into place for the smaller of the 2 pads. It is welded slightly too far forward and without it the bench is useless. It was almost a nice bench.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: great look, and function for the price.
customer_reviews.text: really nice bench for the money. was not difficult to assemble. not only functional, but looks great too. improved the looks, and function of my little home gym. I'm sure I will use it a lot! very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: jimi-sue

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very easy with clear instructions and well packaged parts/tools. The bench is very sturdy and higher quality than I expected for the price. It may not hold up in a commercial gym but it's perfect for a home gym. There was minor damage from shipping but Marcy customer service quickly took care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: draked

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, assembly caused a few problems
customer_reviews.text: Directions aren't that easy to follow, the pictures make more sense. I wish there were more pictures and the screws and nuts and washers were in little labeled bags instead of the cardboard sheet that you rip up anyway to get what you need. Looks great. One negative with the pieces included was a bad screw for the bench handle under the seat where you pull up to move the bench. The one screw got completely stripped while still inside the bracket. and I can't tighten the screw now which makes the handle extremely loose. Overall decent product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lari

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and decently built
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bench for the price, and nice looking. A touch rattly, but still well built and has stood up to presses, inverted lifts, and rows.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: nice bench for great results.
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together was not as easy as I thought it was but the directions were spot on. There is a spring loaded lock that was barely stopping the seat from falling. I reversed my steps and that time it showed a full inch of metal rod. I have used this around 20 times and it is a great little bench. I can use one hand to pick up the incline but need two to bring it down. It definitely helps motivate me.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, long bench for chest rest exercises, reverse flyes etc..
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Decent price, sturdy, long back bench for supporting chest resting excercises. Im 5'11" Cons- Came minimally scratched in areas, no shoes for frame, so you'll need a mat to prevent minimal sliding if no carpet. Assembly manual is a bit of a chore. All in all, a decent buy for name brand equipment. Fyi, you will need a wrench that is not included for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bench a lot. Very sturdy and does what I need it to. I’m just not sure if the upholstery will hold up but would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim From New York

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best bench ever for home gym ! Perfectly designed for multi positions/ quality upholstery/ love the way it looks /built super strong/ PERFECT FOR HOME DUMBBELL WORKOUT !!
customer_reviews.author: robert simon

customer_reviews.title: For the money, can't really find much better.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is nice and sturdy and would get 5 stars if it was level. The back rest in the lowest position actually declines a bit past what would be level. There is only one way to put the back rest on so it is not user/builder error. I made it level by wedging some paper where the arm of the backrest slides into the holder of the frame. It can hold a lot of weight. I weigh 210lbs and benchpress over 300lbs so it can handle over 500lbs without creaking or hinting that it is struggling under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: ths

customer_reviews.title: It's a stable bench.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for my dumbbell workout at my home gym. The seat and the backrest support are very stable to workout with dumbbells. While I assemble this bench, I found two different bolts were defective. I requested Marcy Support new bolts via phone and email and received them a week by mail. I am satisfied with their service and this product. I recommend you if you want to buy a stable bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot find anything negative to say about this bench. On the contrary, for the money I paid, it is comfortable, sturdy, and versatile. It took me an hour, but that's because I made it a point not to have extra parts upon completion of the assembly. Worth every penny in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Pedrero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money. Great with the free weights.
customer_reviews.text: Great basic adjustable bench for your fitness routine. Its also easy to move around with the pull handle and wheels. Adjusting takes no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel s

customer_reviews.title: Great home at gym bench!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a couple of weeks now and it seems to do the job. This obviously doesn't have all the fancy bells and whistles but for what its worth, I'm happy with my order. The only downside is the seat. It seems pretty fragile and if you apply too much weight on the edge, it feels like it's going to snap off.
customer_reviews.author: George N.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and comfortable. I've tested quite a few benches at Sports Authority and Sports Chalet, and all of the ones within this price range were horrible compared to the Marcy Deluxe. PROS: - Sturdy - Cheap - Comfy - Quality pads & metal - Adjustable and sturdy in all positions - Mobile & good on size CONS: - First one came w/ a damaged cushion (couldn't screw it in to the frame) - Packaging will most likely cause scratches & dents
customer_reviews.author: Tuan

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but a little wobbly on the bottom arm keeping it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dunanski

customer_reviews.title: packaging was good. Installation instructions are fairly straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, packaging was good. Installation instructions are fairly straightforward. However, after putting it together, the seat is crooked. I took it apart and non of the parts seem bent, I think the holes in the bottom of the seat pad are not aligned properly. It doesn't bother me enough to return it, but seems to corroborate other reviews on build quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I received the box in excellent condition. The bench was packaged nicely in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the box in excellent condition. The bench was packaged nicely in the box and organized and packed with foam. The instructions are a little difficult to follow, but if you’re handy, it’s a breeze to put together. A very big con is that the hardware is very cheap. The axels are nice, but the nuts and bolts can cross thread very easily. Be careful when bolting together that you have the bolt perfectly lined up before tightening down.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lasota

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected at the price point. It's not as solid as the benches in the gym, but for occasional use at home, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, slight defects.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my squat rack a couple months ago. It's holding up pretty well. My only issue is that when the bench is flat it's actually at a slight decline at about 5 degrees. Could just be a defect in my particular bench. The defect wasn't enough to make me return it though.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wakim

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bench! Was inexpensive and relatively easy to put together. It is well built- solid feel, quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Saggio

customer_reviews.title: Good bench of solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Pretty simple to assemble if you have some level of mechanical aptitude. If not, the directions could be a little more detailed. Overall, I found it a snap to put together and did so in less than 20 minutes. I used my own tools though, (driver with allen wrench bits and socket set) which made it easier than using the allen wrenches that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: MykDnm

customer_reviews.title: I like this bench so much because it is easily adjustable--so ...
customer_reviews.text: With some back issues, I like this bench so much because it is easily adjustable--so you don't have to lie flat. It is adjustable both in the back and the seat. So you can get it just right. It is well made and doesn't take up much space. So I have it in a room that has multiple purposes. And it came early!
customer_reviews.author: stellar shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! Easy to adjust. The welding is fine on my unit. It's a bit troublesome to put together with the directions, but doable. I did it on my own in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: KateW

customer_reviews.title: this bench is pretty decent. I do feel that it's sometimes not ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this bench is pretty decent. I do feel that it's sometimes not sturdy when I sit on it and I'm only 120lbs. If i was heavier, I'd definitely return. However, it's good enough for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Topgear88

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench
customer_reviews.text: Solid bench. Straightforward assembly and use. I use this in flat and incline positions with up to 60lb dumbbells and 95 lb barbell and it feels very solid. I looked at a lot of options in this price range and I feel I picked the right bench for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Potts

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in rain. Box fell apart. Could not find box big enough to return. Pieces missing. More then 80 pieces to assemble. Still in pile more then a year later. Expensive debacle. Marcy not helpful, aggressive and belligerent. Took the lose, it was a birthday present gone wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench
customer_reviews.text: Great workout bench. Easy to put together and so very comfortable. Sturdy enough for the hardest workouts. The cushions are thick and the bench is easy to adjust as needed
customer_reviews.author: bridget mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: this is great for a home gym from the two days of ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the seat holes were misaligned so that I could only fit in 3 of the 4 screws. I'm not even sure how to replace the seat, the thing would be too cumbersome and time consuming to send back for this reason. Otherwise, this is great for a home gym from the two days of experience I've had with it. Installation was not too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: moussawiali

customer_reviews.title: Good starter bench
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My boyfriend loves it. The only down side is it has a very slight wobble when it's inclined. Other than that, it is really good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jana F

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym bench
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bench after searching for a budget friendly but sturdy home bench that does incline / flat / and decline. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Folds up to store in a closet when not in use. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a sturdy and versatile home gym bench that won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Doran

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but the assembly could have been a little better illustrated. UPDATE: I've had this bench for quite some time now. It is every bit the same quality as what you find in the gym. I've used all the different angles and it holds up great. Marcy benches are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E

customer_reviews.title: Send correct parts!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the stupid things, mine came with two left-hand brackets for the seat. I'm not spending shipping to send this thing back, but come on, quality control! I literally have two brackets for the same side, where the seat is mounted. I had to modify the seat of the bench to get the thing put together to use! I'm pretty handy, so not too big a deal for me, but if someone else got this and they didn't have the tools or the know-how to modify it, they would be out quite a bit of coin, not to mention time they couldn't use it! Not a bad bench, if you get the right parts.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my house and it’s very heavy duty. No thought about it that this will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: aron sprague

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like it . The bench came with a defective seat . Marcy will replace it when they get one in stock . The Marcy rep was very nice and very prompt responding to my issue
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months now and its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and worth’s great. You’ll be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GJ™️

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I assemble this bench by myself in less than 30 minutes. I like the different incline options and that it will lie completely flat. I am a little concerned about stepping up on it as the back support is only attached to the frame down the middle. I'll have to make sure to step squarely on it and not on the edge. to make sure I don't break it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy I ordered this bench. It wasn't too expensive and it gets the job done. Really sturdy and well built! Although I might say that it was a little bit difficult to put together. Other than that, definitely recpmmend
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the value
customer_reviews.text: I just went through set up. So far so good, the quality itself is exactly what I wanted and paid for. Nothing too fancy but it'll get the job done and all for under a hundred bucks and a bit of my time. Only reason why I kocked down a star, was because of the manual. The directions are extremely confusing, so I put that suckered to the side and used my own two eyes to make it happen
customer_reviews.author: Luis Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Still use is years later
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and still use it to this day after buying years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Max Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to put together! Love it! I am 6'2 and 185lbs., this bench is super sturdy and comfortable for me. I highly recommend this Marcy bench, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andy w.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, I have not had any issues as ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, I have not had any issues as of yet with the chair. I do wish that it had more degrees to adjust too but other than that its a good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great support and easy to use. Stores away well when folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Yahshua

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price on a bench like this. It will do nicely for my needs. Assembly was a breeze except for the fact that I recently had knee surgery and couldn't kneel down. The instructions are clear enough, the parts easy to identify, and everything lined up properly. I weigh 180 and it supports me without any shake
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived is good shape. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived is good shape. Easy to assemble. Used it for flat and incline bench this weekend and it was great. My previous bench didn't have a seat that tilted so doing incline was kinda difficult. This one solved the problem for me. For the money this was a god buy. One complaint is that there could have more angles to choice from. The first incline position is not my ideal angle. Second gripe is that it would be nice if the back locked into place to make it easier to pick up and move. But, like I said, for the money its a good bench.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J

customer_reviews.title: Heavy enough to hold me and the weights I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough to hold me and the weights I am using (215lbs self + 200+ of weights) yet light enough I can move it quickly by picking it up.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this bench. Easy to assemble and easy to use. Did not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Scott Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Great bench so far
customer_reviews.text: Great bench so far. There were a lot of steps to put it together but easy to follow the instructions. Seems very sturdy and able to hold a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: GShoe

customer_reviews.title: really happy with this bench
customer_reviews.text: Overall, really happy with this bench. It was easy to assemble and a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good bench for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: Good bench for what I needed it for. Not lifting extreme weights. Like that if folds up so I can lean it against the too get it out of the way in our room which is pretty small. Wait for it to go on sale though so you're not paying full price.
customer_reviews.author: Heavypku

customer_reviews.title: Instructions to a sec to figure out buy all in all it was easy. I'm 6ft 175/180 and so far I've got ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about a week. Came packaged well, and I put it together in about 30 to 45 mins. Instructions to a sec to figure out buy all in all it was easy. I'm 6ft 175/180 and so far I've got no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bench with bad part
customer_reviews.text: The bench seems like pretty good quality. But the bracket that attaches to the incline adjuster bar was the wrong size. Luckily, I had a friend who was able to machine down some of the parts. This is a critical part of the bench. It would have been too much of a pain to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable bench at a good price point. Very adjustable and comfortable. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: James/Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Hurrah for the Marcy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy. The bench gets the job done. I can't ask for more for the money. It's even pretty light, so I can store it out of the way after work outs in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. I'm 6' tall and around 230 lbs. The bench is comfortable to use and feels very stable when I'm on it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Bench is great, easy to adjust and comfortable. The only issue is in the shipping, the way the box is packed there could be damage to the lower bench seat. Also the instruction could be a little easier to understand, I am sure nontechnical people can have issues with putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Love my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love product. I'm a woman and assembly was easy. Use for at home workout during covid. Would recommended. Seat a little wobbly due to set up. It works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Katina

customer_reviews.title: Super bench!
customer_reviews.text: Use it 5-6 days a week for the Hammer and Chisel home program works perfect. Easy to assemble, sturdy and we'll made. I put a oga mat under it snce I have bare floors and it keeps it I place even while doing step ups. Happy customer;)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and affordable; needs better functions on the bench. Moving handle should be built on it instead of alan wrenching; it's possible to have the bench decline; can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench that looks even better in person. For around a $120, there is nothing better. The best features are the fully adjustable seat and none of those ugly foam rollers for your feet. This has been a great addition to my home gym. Did I mention, this bench is ROCK SOLID!! Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Not hard to assemble. Standard Chinese assembly instructions so, not the best instructions but adequate. No problems...and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Musicjunkie2k

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bench for around $100
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bench for around $100.00 I have been weightlifting for years and have recently decided to quit going to the gym and set up a small workout room in my house. There are a lot of cheap benches out there but I don't feel comfortable on them. I took a chance on buying this one on line without trying it out and I am very happy with it. There are multiple positions to put the seat and back to accommodate a variety of exercises. When you're done, it folds up neatly and I put it against the wall out of the way. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Buy cheap get cheap
customer_reviews.text: was put together correctly and seat slips down every time you sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Supes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour to assemble. It's definitely holding up well. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Remi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very easy to put together and everyone comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Now I would say this bench is the Bomb. Looks great and very easy to put together and everyone comes into my room says how nice it looks. has all of the adjustments that is needed.to get a good workout. Andy Mclean Va
customer_reviews.author: Amazonandrew Johnson

product_meta.title: Marcy Adjustable Utility Bench for Home Gym Workout SB-670
product_meta.description:
For a reliable gym accessory, get the Adjustable Utility bench from Marcy!

If you’re into various types of exercises and working to build the muscles in your chest, shoulders, back, abs, and more, then this deluxe utility bench is for you! It is made from premium-quality materials that guarantee stability and long-lasting use. It keeps your body sufficiently secured and supported during light or intense workouts alike with its powder-coated steel frame. It also has a high-density foam and two-tone upholstery.

Not only is the back pad high adjustable, it is highly adaptable as well! It could fit most squat racks, half cages and Smith machines. It is also designed with built-in transport wheels and a handle grip, making moving it much easier! Using this workout bench at home, at the gym, or in any outdoor exercise area is ideal. You can also fold the bench flat for hassle-free storage.

Perform exercises to tone your chest, shoulders, and abs with comfort and ease. This no-nonsense bench allows you to sit, kneel, and lie down when you do curls, lifts, and presses, giving you the freedom to shape your body just the way you want it. It is also compatible while other workout machines such as squat rack, Smith machines, and more, allowing you to build your dream home gym!

The assembled dimensions of this equipment measures 52” (l) x 25” (w) x 46.5” (h) inches. IDEAL FOR EASY TRANSPORT – This equipment is designed with built-in transport wheels and a handle grip for efficient mobility, making it ideal to use at home, gym, or even in an outdoor workout area. The bench includes hassle-free storage. Maximum user weight - 300lb 



AMAZON.COM
Work your chest, shoulders, back, biceps, triceps, abs, and more with the Marcy SB670 deluxe utility bench. The SB670 is comfortable and supportive, with deluxe boxed upholstery constructed of top-grade, high-density foam. The six-position back pad, meanwhile, adjusts from flat to incline to decline, so you can work your muscles from several positions. Other features include a three-position seat adjustment, a durable powder-coated finish, and a foldaway front post for easy storage. The bench--which functions independently or adapts to fit most squat racks, half cages, and Smith machines--measures 57 by 50 by 26 inches (W x H x D), weighs 46 pounds, and carries a two-year limited warranty against defects.
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR A FULL-BODY WORKOUT – The adjustable utility bench from Marcy is ideal for working out and building up the muscles in your chest, shoulders, back, abs, and more. It’s a great unit for a full-body workout, whether you’re at home or at the gym.

DELUXE-BOXED UPHOLSTERY -This utility bench is made from premium-quality materials. It has a powder-coated steel frame with high-density foam in black and white upholstery. This keeps your body secured and supported during light or intense workouts alike

ADJUSTABLE SIX-POSITION BACK PAD – The back pad is highly adjustable and can be set to different angles to help perform chest exercises such as incline, military, decline, and flat presses. The tilting seat can be adjusted to 3 positions to fit any user.

ADAPTABLE TO FIT MOST MACHINES – Not only is this equipment highly adjustable, it’s adaptable as well! Attach it to other squat racks, half cages, and Smith machines and get the most out of your workout. The assembled dimensions measures 52 x 25 x 46.5
